Select Shipping Method: Amazon Simple Pay service capture confirmation error: confirmation request amount is not equal to the amount of order.

Select Shipping Method: Amazon Simple Pay service capture confirmation error: the amount in the existing invoice does not match the amount in the confirmation request.

Select Shipping Method: Amazon Simple Pay service capture confirmation error: the existing transaction ID does not match the transaction ID in the confirmation request.
